page.title: 01DESCRIPTION OF BLOCK
page.content: Most of the land in our block is{farm {land.}There is some grazing land and some fields which had been ploughed for planting crops.Most of the animals we saw were cattle and sheep. {Skene school}lies in the south east corner of our block.It looked small and old. The{Loch of Skene}dominates almost one whole square.Aberdeen sailing club use the loch in the winter.We also saw Dunecht power scheme built in 1923 not far from the loch. There are two tower houses beside the loch which were built in 1923. {Game}like golden pheasant and grouse are kept on the estate.There were a few places where there was burnt heather.This encouraged new shoots for the grouse to eat. We passed Gairloch's{blacksmith}which used to be an old church.
